website_summaries.verdict: A powerful motor that can carry plenty of weight.
pros: This engine is quiet and packs a serious punch
Installation is straightforward, and the motor requires no chains or exposed moving parts
The 48-volt 1,000-watt engine has a max speed of 29 mph
Includes a 26-inch rear wheel with tire
cons: Difficult to maintain a steady speed with the thumb throttle, and there is no way to set a speed

customer_reviews.title: Worked out well the bike is a blast.
customer_reviews.text: Love it..bike works great, if I have any complaint it's the weigh but obviously with led acid batterys there was no way around that.. Bike is so much fun and great for getting around town. Could not be more pleased..(I have since gone to a LI-ION battery... (.highly recommended improvement) bike is lighter And range and pwr is better
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: You should know this.. ?
customer_reviews.text: This is my second kit. I will use twist ties instead of zipties, because you're going to move the wires, maybe more than once. The ebike's voltage is 48v, but the batteries in the other buyer's also got.. isn't correct. 2 12v batteries are 24v. Weigh 26lbs and you need 48v. Buy a Toro battery at home depot for $129. Get a good compatible charger, save yourself the time. Order a rack for the controller and batteries, get a quick connect (plug) installed and you are set. Not thrilled about the lack of information on the trouble shoot page, and no way, to reach customer service, until you return the two lead batteries. Happy Trails
customer_reviews.author: BipolarBear

customer_reviews.title: This is a very powerful hub motor kit at a nice price. Even with four 12V
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my first e-bike conversion. This is a very powerful hub motor kit at a nice price. Even with four 12V, 12 AH lead-acid batteries and a 200 lb. rider, the speed and acceleration are impressive. I heartily recommend this kit to anyone contemplating an electric bike conversion.
customer_reviews.author: William Jenkins III

customer_reviews.title: bike wheel
customer_reviews.text: wheel came on time , after putting on my bike wheel had a clicking noise from with in the wheel hub .reported to A.W international, sent video, than waited for a rely . Had to get amazon to finish transaction .But as for the wheel, good power, was easy to put on and hook up. sorry for the inconvenice
customer_reviews.author: chas

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, can go up hill and can go so fast 35mph easily with lithium battery. Not lead battery, lead battery maybe get about 30% of its power.
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: everything broke
customer_reviews.text: The only piece of this kit i have not had to replace is the motor. honestly save yourself the money and research components and purchase them separately. Also this does not come with a PAS.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kejsar

customer_reviews.title: Good looking setup for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'll add more once I have it up & running. I won't know how it actualy works untill I have my battery problems sorted out. I have a pair of 13x9 packs for a total 40.5 Amps, so I should get a decent speed & range out of it. The kit itself looks great. Everything came as shown, and the rim seems solid & installed fairly easily with a little leveraging on the frame. Everything else installed fine. the controller looks well made, the throttle is basic plastic & I may upgrade it later. The brakes feel solid as well.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: One mountain bike conversion.
customer_reviews.text: Theses are good motors for a simulated pedal assist . The battery lasts longer on these motors than a front drive motor. One of my boys out of the three prefers this motor. I like the mid drive motors better. This motor makes the rear of the bike heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie or Mike Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Turns off mid-ride.
customer_reviews.text: The pack has been good so far until today 18km when it shut off on the way to work today. I'm not sure why. If I unplug the batt (XT90) and plug it back in it works for a bit but then shuts off again after a few hundred meters. Only replugging the battery in seems to reset it. I normally have been getting 40km per day out of the battery between charges. I have only put about 500km on the bike so far. Anyone have any ideas or suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Easy . Fast . simple . powerful .perfect for commute
customer_reviews.text: The rear wheel is a bit thick but it does fit Pretty quite ride I weight 330 pounds and still I get speeds up to 40 mph on just battery alone . Easy to put together fast and simple . I can't drive because of my seizures . This kit allows me to easily go anywhere on town I want to .
customer_reviews.author: saiphoned

customer_reviews.title: I think the price went up but it seems good and I am having fun with it!
customer_reviews.text: Great value - not too hard to install although directions are USELESS - hit 30mph on flat ground!
customer_reviews.author: Golden Man

customer_reviews.title: ONE fun ride
customer_reviews.text: Wheel works as advertised. I bought both the front and rear tires to make an all wheel drive ebike. I'm limited to 34mph due to the hubs RPM. But this is just an experiment ebike anyways. With both wheels I can get to 34mph faster. It is fun to ride and enough torque to throw you back if you are not ready.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Brooks

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY NOT INCLUDED!
customer_reviews.text: BATTERY NOT INCLUDED Easy to get and easy to put on does not come with BATTERY! PLUS YOU HAVE TO ORDER THE BATTERY SOMEWHERE ELSE AMAZON DONT DELIVER TO ALASKA BECAUSE THE LITHIUM! Have to buy a lithium battery that's 48v 14ah or higher to power this 1000 watt motor
customer_reviews.author: Lester

customer_reviews.title: I love this motor it works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! I realy won’t more of them!! I want to start using these on every bike I build!! I want to start getting these out to people! I would love for them to sponsor my bike company and I’ll build with there product all day long I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: RooR5mok3

customer_reviews.title: So much power!
customer_reviews.text: I am using a 48V 13A battery with it an have been very pleased with the performance. Makes biking so much more fun and was pretty easy to install (and I had never done it before).
customer_reviews.author: Phil Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Well the product is good but not easy to install. Secondly the Battery is not included with the whole kit which is another overhead. One may choose to buy an electric bike instead of adding all those extra efforts and money.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on when not pushing on the button....numb thumb!!
customer_reviews.text: It has no middle speed, either on or off! Have to keep thumb on power at all times so that is very inconvenient and hard on your thumb! I am hopeful someone can help fix it, or will be sending back! I will upgrade the rating if it is fixable...
customer_reviews.author: denise ellis

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull motor
customer_reviews.text: This is very powerfull motor, I have been using it for about 2months and it is like deiving a motorcycle, it can get about 45km/hr on flat ways and about 35 km/hr on uphills of about 13grades or more...
customer_reviews.author: Luis Villamizar

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Put it together in 15 minutes and nothing. check the connections and battery and nothing. spent two weeks troubleshooting it with advice from people online and nothing. turns out the company that makes it has a 3% failure rate and by the time I troubleshot it and realized it was shipped broken worked. don't buy this it most likely won't work
customer_reviews.author: mad mom

customer_reviews.title: Please send me a new controller
customer_reviews.text: Works great for two months and then the controller died currently talking to customer service and they said they will send me a new controler. once I get the controler I will update my review
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't go with the thumb throttle. There is a reason motorcycles don't have them.
customer_reviews.text: I thought a 1000 watt motor would perform better. Then again it's my first build. Also maybe sell a most suitable battery with the kit , since you have to buy one anyway.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Did not put out anywhere close to a thousand watts of power, and during acceleration, it would jerk a couple times and bog down, not sure if the problem is controller or motor, don't waste your time on this one just spend the extra $50 and get the next step up
customer_reviews.author: electroSizzle

customer_reviews.title: But all the parts worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well only complaint is that the included "satchel" didn't work very well. But all the parts worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Justin D

customer_reviews.title: i must retract my earlier review of this item.
customer_reviews.text: it was my error the key switch on the battery has a run position, I didn't know that. I do now. I retract all the negativity.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Turn my gt mountain bike into a hunting e bike
customer_reviews.author: Chris Howey

customer_reviews.title: There is no fixed setting like 10% or 20% or 50% or 100%
customer_reviews.text: Install wasn't as difficult as I thought. Performance is good/great. I would have given it 5 stars, but the control lever is very inconvenient. There is no fixed setting like 10% or 20% or 50% or 100%. It is literally impossible to maintain a steady speed and after a short period your thumb is numb because you can't keep the lever in a steady position. I am not sure whether there are controls which allow for a different (semi permanent setting) without having to hold & keep the lever constantly in a certain position with your thumb. Everything else is great, but the speed control/setting "sucks".
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Ready to assemble no need for any thing except a battery good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great motor/wheel. Sketchy controller and wires.
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a week. Everything works on it but realize that you are gonna get what you pay for. Some stuff you will have to figure out yourself which will be specific to your bike and battery.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Moss

customer_reviews.title: I love this thang
customer_reviews.text: I love this thang. Its a bit hard on batterys but that may just be me. It will move up to around 35 miles an hour with a trailer on behind and around 70 pounds there. I put the battery pack in the trailer and it works very well. I will post a pix soon. Thank you for your time.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazingly fun addition to a bike, really helps with hills!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Leonard Schrimsher

customer_reviews.title: I realized to late that this was no good for this kit
customer_reviews.text: I think that the company's description should have included the type of battery required to power this kit. After buying the two lot fancy 24V 2A battery, I realized to late that this was no good for this kit. I had destroyed the box it came in and parallel connected them. So I could not return them. The battery charger is also useless. The battery required for this cost anywhere from 500$ to 900$!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michel Goyette

customer_reviews.title: Does what I bought it for
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it off-label as part of a stationary exercise bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey Green

customer_reviews.title: I ordered it online because he doesn't know how to use a computer and I am pleased he got and paid for what he asked for
customer_reviews.text: The order met my expectations in that I ordered for my next door neighbor, whether or not it has met his expectations has yet to be seen; As for me, he picked out the product, I ordered it online because he doesn't know how to use a computer and I am pleased he got and paid for what he asked for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit it hooked up pretty easily and after a but of work it seems to work. I will update this review in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Kscribe

product_meta.title: AW 26"x1.75" Rear Wheel 48V 1000W Electric Bicycle Motor Kit E-Bike Cycling Hub Conversion Dual Mode Controller
product_meta.description:
Notice: 
Battery and Charger are Not Included.
Battery Recommendation: Electro kinetic cell battery featured in nominal voltage 48v, nominal capacity 17-20Ah is compatible with the motor.

Specification:
Overall Dimension: 25 13/16" x 1 9/16" (65.5 x 4 cm)
Axle Length: 7 11/16" (19.5 cm)
Rear Dropout Spacing: 5 5/16" (13.5 cm)
Spokes Length: 6 5/16" (16 cm)
Controller Size: 8 1/4" x 3 3/8" x 1 3/4" (21 x 8.5 x 4.5 cm)
The Number of Spokes: 36
Controller Power: 1000W
Motor Power: 1000W
Motor Voltage: 48V
Motor Rotating Speed: 470 RPM
Motor Torque: 40 to 45 N.m
High Motor Efficiency: more than 85%
Net weight: 24.71 Lbs (11.21 kg)

Package Content:
1x 26" Rear Wheel with Brushless Hub Motor
1x Battery Connection Cable
1x Electric Controller
2x Hand Brakes
2x Handle Grips
1x Thumb Throttle
1x Controller Bag
1x Set of Winding Pipe and Cable Tie
2x Terminal Boxes
1x Manual
feature_bullets: 1000W 48V 26" Electric Bicycle Rear Hub Conversion Kit, fit for 5 5/16" rear dropout spacing, with a speed of 31 mile/h (50 km/h), make your bicycle an electric power moped, brushless hub motor for noiseless running, to fully enjoy the pleasure of riding.

Dual Mode Controller - Motor works under Hall effect and non-Hall effect, extend life for electric bicycle (If the components break down, controller will switch into non-hall effect mode, the motor will still be working ).
Durable Frame - Aluminum alloy frame for durability and stability.
Convenient to Use - Thumb throttle with battery monitor makes speed control as a breeze.
Hand brakes shut off the motor automatically to save energy and improve safety. Environmental Protection - Powered by battery, without carbon dioxide emissions.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
